DOC.detailed_description: AB-SA01 consist three bacteriophage ( virus ) target Staphylococcus aureus bacteria . The safety AB-SA01 assess topically administer daily volar aspect forearm dose 10^8 plaque form unit ( PFU ) per phage 3 consecutive day , dose 10^9 plaque form unit ( PFU ) per phage 3 consecutive day . Both AB-SA01 placebo administer subject provide his/her control evaluation skin reaction . The right left placement placebo randomize double-blinded .
